/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. Cars and buses, parked neatly along the sides of the street, add a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the expansive view. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is a testament to the vibrancy and energy of city life in Beijing.
